name: dist_to_gadm28_borders
title: Distance to Country Borders (GADM 2.8)
description: Distance to country borders, measured in meters. Derived using GADM 2.8 ADM0 (Country) boundaries.

extract_types_info.mean: average distance per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.max: maximum distance per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.min: minimum distance per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.count: total count of pixels per unit of analysis
